title: Study Design Concept Map
description: Interactive concept map showing how foundational statistics concepts (population, sample, variables, parameters, statistics) connect in the context of a real research study about sleep and academic performance.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Statistics
Study Design
Research Methods
Data Science
learningObjective: Students will organize all chapter concepts into a coherent mental framework by seeing how population, sample, variables, parameters, and statistics relate in a real study.
